metadata.title: Friday, 20th September, 2024
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that the security company that was contracted to provide security at Katete Fruit Processing Plant in Katete District withdrew its services;
(b) if so, why the security company withdrew its services;
(c) what measures are being taken to ensure that the Plant is secure; and
(d) when the Plant will be officially opened.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why there is so much uncollected garbage in the Central Business District of Lusaka; and

(b) what urgent measures are being taken to collect the garbage and avert an outbreak of disease. 8. ORDER OF THE DAY Thanks – The President’s Address - Motion (17th September) - Resumption of Debate. ___________________________
